EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q4.Global.NUR.2130.XLE Finance.Email 1 - Centuries-Young Bank Case Study
EmailTemplate.subject: Changing the game with private cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Banks use OpenStack private clouds to transform operations Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Many banks are taking a wait-and-see approach with open source platforms such as OpenStack.
Others have already implemented OpenStack private clouds for competitive advantage.
So how did they succeed?
Our case study discusses how a major bank created a global private cloud that leverages OpenStack not only to unify their environment but also to improve security. If you would like to have a Nokia representative contact you, please click here <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]>.
Enjoy!
Michael Williams Financial Services Manager, Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
